Description: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage, 1.8GHz Intel Core i5)-Silver
Features: 1.8GHz dual-core 5th-generation Intel Core i5 with Turbo Boost up to 2.9GHz
Up to 10 hours wireless web battery life
Two USB 3 ports (up to 5 Gbps), Thunderbolt 2 port (up to 20 Gbps), MagSafe 2 power port, SDXC card slot
802.11ac Wi-Fi wireless networking; IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n compatible. Bluetooth 4.0 wireless technology
